title: Afforded by Nature - Traveler Set Card 2 of 9
content:
Revised text is highlighted.

This card's cost is now 0 instead of 3.

Elder's notes: This card has the rather powerful ability to outright clear a being with harm so long as you have enough progress on a trail in play. Rather than tweak this ability, we've decided that discarding progress from a trail is enough of a cost for this effect, so we've changed this card's cost to 0.
